overview: Pulitha Liyanagama is the Co-founder of Comufy. He has been actively involved in Enterprise applications development for over ten years. His experiences include design, development and deployment of load balancing/clustering solutions, high performance capital market systems and telecommunications service discovery frameworks. He has been actively participating to projects including the Boston and Nairobi Stock exchange trader core developments, the British Telecom 21Câ„¢ service discovery framework and OPRO Japan’s OPRO Xâ„¢ report generation server. He holds an MSc in Distributed Systems and Networks from University of Kent where he completed his PhD in Model Driven Engineering â€“ pending viva.
